name: FOOD EXPLOSION
description:
FOOD EXPLOSION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Shoot foods and accumulate as much money as you can. Spend your money to buy new more beautiful and powerful weapons. Challenge your friends to whoever has the most powerful weapon.                    INSPIRATED BY BANANA EXPLOSION 

Sources :

Music : "Unser Kaiserhaus", "True To The Flag", "Kaiser Friedrich" - United States Marine Band (Youtube Sound Library)

Sound Effects : https://www.zapsplat.com/

Font : https://www.1001freefonts.com/ (OldNewspaperTypes)                                    Images :  menu map https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Flibraries.indiana.edu%2Fdigiti..., gamemap https://imgur.com/gallery/65bcZTT, gear https://fr.depositphotos.com/34762207/stock-photo-real-stainless-steel-gears-isolated.html, camo https://kknews.cc/zh-sg/fashion/y3e8pyg.html, bullet http://www.aljanh.net/bullets/,
